question: Why did the Yellow Ancient fly up to the radiant sun?

question: Why was Li Oerl called Laotsze?
answer1: When he was born his hair and beard were white.

question: What will happen when the five Ancients set all their primal spirit into motion?
answer1: Water and earth will sink down.

question: How did the Yellow Ancient create grasses and trees, birds and beasts, and the tribes of the serpents and insects, fishes and turtles?

answer4: The Yellow Ancient set earth's purest power spinning in a circle, and added the effect of fire and water thereto.

question: What will the Yellow Ancient do when he is born again?

answer4: He will write the book of "Meaning and Life" and spread his teachings through the world.
answer5: He will spread the teachings of Tao abroad mightily.
